name: Jaisen Mathai
overview:
Jaisen Mathai is currently working on a bootstrapped open source photo service called Trovebox (Formerly OpenPhoto) that successfully raised funding on Kickstarter. Mathai was an engineering tech lead and software engineer at Yahoo from 2007 to May of 2011, when he left to pursue his Trovebox project.
While at Yahoo, Mathai worked on various projects including ones which were used by Mail and Frontpage, and hacked on a side project, Melts My Heart which was a mobile photo sharing application targeted towards mothers. The app was available in the Android Market.
